summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending SMC Sections 23.41.004, 23.41.006, and 23.41.008, 23.41.014, 23.76.011, 23.76.012, 23.76.026 and adding a new Section 23.41.016 to the Seattle Municipal Code to implement changes to the Early Project Implementation Design Review process.
